name: Alea iacta est (BlueSquareMoves)
description:
You can place units in the lower rows and the computer places in the top rows.

When you end your turn a dice(text) is rolled and chooses one of the boards where you attack. If there are units in the way they are attack. Else the computer is attacked.  The choosen board is shown in green. Then the computer does the same thing. Where they get to attack is marked with red.

The goal is to get the computer health to 0 thouht nothing will happen if you do

(The fighting is a bit buggy)
